caption:
The Drunk Elephant philosophy has always been: To fix a skin issue, get rid of what’s causing it. That’s why we have never—and will never—formulate with what we call the Suspicious 6, the six ingredient categories that are at the root of many skin issues. If you remove the Suspicious 6 from your routine by using nothing but the Littles for 30 days, two things will happen: 1) Your skin will reset to its healthiest, happiest state and 2) so will you. Just watch. 
 
Xx, Tiffany
